summary: Fixes the decapitation bug on the cultist masks added by the Dragonborn DLC.
descriptionHtml:
Mesh replacer for the cultist mask added by Dragonborn to fix the decapitation bug.

There are more helmets that suffer from this bug, but they are fixed and improved by mods such as:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15927/?]Improved closefaced helmets[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4866/?]Open Faced Helmets[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9514/?]Open Faced Guard Helmets[/url]

None of them touches the cultist mask so I fixed it.

[b]REQUIREMENTS[/b]
This is only a mesh replacer, it will do nothing without Dragonborn.
author: pauderek
